text:
[Verse]
Look outside the clouds are gray
Come on let's chase the gloom away
Find the rhythm in each drop
Don't let this moment ever stop

[Verse]
Splashing puddles in bare feet
Heartbeat syncs with every beat
Laughter echoes through the air
In this rain we lose our care

[Chorus]
Dance in the rain
Feel no pain
Round and round
Love unbound

[Verse]
No umbrella we don't care
Wet hair flying everywhere
Thunder rumbles in the sky
Feel the magic as we fly

[Bridge]
Lightning flashes bright and bold
In each other we find gold
Drenched in joy and pure delight
We'll remember this tonight

[Chorus]
Dance in the rain
Feel no pain
Round and round
Love unbound
title: Dance in the Rain
